0: a used Bobby pin laying in the shower both of the headboard lamps are not working and according to the repair guy it takes around 45 mins to replace the LED light bulbs and I actually found a small blood stain on the headboard

They are renovating some rooms and the noise during the day can be annoying if you are from another time zone and unfortunately need an occasional day napMake sure to ask if your room is on a floor or near the renovations
Both rooms had minor maintenance issues but were taken care of very quickly
CONSit is going to need renovation soon
Daily cleaning is obviously done but this staining has been there over a long period and just ignored so I am concerned about their maintenance programme there is just no excuse for it
While nice there were several maintenance and housekeeping issues every day no toiletries when I arrived missing towels the next day missing and burned out light bulbs tape on wall stain on curtains
Called to report problem and maintenance said the lights power had been removed for upgrading

Needed some maintenance to be done in the room waited an hour long which was disappointing considering we wanted to be by the pool on a beautiful day rather than sitting around in a room waiting for someone
I have not modified any of my original comments below but in fairness I must update my review to inform that the Cosmopolitan did reach out to me regarding my comments
I was a bit disappointed in my room but then again it is going to get a major overhaul this coming summer
1: Our room had been recently renovated and was huge compared with most big city hotel spaces
We stayed in a renovated room on the 69th floor in the north tower
The fixtures are new and the bathrooms are spacious TVs are updated and they have a good desk to write on
The rooms were spacious and updated
was fortunate to get a room that had been updated this time i opted out of the fountain view although the views at the backs are great the extra you pay for a fountain view is totally worth it
Good location on the strip and updated rooms but the casino floor is smokier than it should be based on older casinos who do a better job of ventilating
newly renovated rooms are great location is smack in the middle of the strip nothing not to like
I feel it was a good value for it is location and updated features
We booked a Terrace Studio Fountain View room which had recently been renovated
We stayed here for 4 days from 26th October as we were renewing our wedding vows
